data.title: Blue Thoughts (5CD SET)
data.text:
CD 1 Chet Baker Sings & Plays

1. Let’s Get Lost (3:44)

2. This Is Always (3:07)

3. Long Ago (And Far Away) (3:58)

4. Someone To Watch Over Me (3:02)

5. Just Friends (2:43)

6. I Wish I Knew (3:59)

7. Daybreak (2:41)

8. You Don’t Know What Love Is (4:51)

9. Grey December (3:42)

10. I Remember You (3:15)

Total Playing Time: Approx 34 mins

Original Album Produced By Richard Bock

Musical Arrangements By Johnny Mandel, Marty Paich And Frank Campo

Recorded February 28 and March 7th 1955, At Capitol Studios, Los Angeles

Originally Released On Pacific Jazz Records (PJ 1202), 1955

Personnel:

Chet Baker – Trumpet, Vocals

Bud Shank – Flute

Russ Freeman – Piano

Red Mitchell – Bass

Carson Smith – Bass

Bob Neel – Drums

Corky Hale – Harp

Ed Lustgarten – Cello

Ray Kramer – Cello

Eleanor Slatkin – Cello

Kurt Reher – Cello

CD 2 Chet Baker Sings

1. That Old Feeling (3:04)

2. It’s Always You (3:35)

3. Like Someone In Love (2:26)

4. My Ideal (4:24)

5. I’ve Never Been In Love Before (4:29)

6. My Buddy (3:20)

7. But Not For Me (3:04)

8. Time After Time (2:46)

9. I Get Along Without You Very Well (2:59)

10. My Funny Valentine (2:19)

11. There Will Never Be Another You (3:00)

12. The Thrill Is Gone (2:51)

13. I Fall In Love Too Easily (3:20)

14. Look For The Silver Lining (2:41)

Total Playing Time: Approx 41 mins

Original Album Produced By Richard Bock

Recorded July 23 & 30, 1956, At The Forum Theatre, Los Angeles and

February 15, 1954, At Capitol Studios, Los Angeles

Originally Released On Pacific Jazz (PJ-1222), 1956

Personnel:

Chet Baker – Trumpet, Vocals

Russ Freeman – Piano, Celeste

James Bond – Bass

Carson Smith – Bass

Peter Littman – Drums

Lawrence Marable – Drums

Bob Neel – Drums

CD 3 Chet Baker & Crew

1. To Mickey’s Memory (5:18)

2. Slightly Above Moderate (7:02)

3. Halema (3:54)

4. Revelation (4:02)

5. Something For Liza (4:09)

6. Lucius Lu (5:39)

7. Worryin’ The Life Out Of Me (3:03)

8. Medium Rock (5:33)

Total Playing Time: Approx 38 mins

Original Album Produced By Richard Bock

Recorded At The Forum Theathre, Los Angeles, CA,

July 24th, 25th & 31st, 1956

Originally Released On Pacific Jazz Records (PJ-1224), 1956

Personnel:

Chet Baker – Vocals, Trumpet

Phil Urso – Tenor Saxophone

Bobby Timmons – Piano

Jimmy Bond – Bass

Peter Littman – Drums

Bill Loughborough – Tympani

CD 4 In New York

1.Fair Weather (6:56)

2.Polka Dots and Moonbeams (7:57)

3.Hotel 49 (9:52)

4.Solar (5:52)

5.Blue Thoughts (7:35)

6.When Lights Are Low (6:53)

Total Playing Time: Approx 45 mins

Original Album Produced By Orrin Keepnews

Recorded September, 1958, At Reeves Sound Studios, New York, NY

Originally Released On Riverside Records (RPL-1119), 1958

Personnel:

Chet Baker – Trumpet

Johnny Griffin – Tenor Saxophone

Al Haig – Piano

Paul Chambers – Bass

Philly Joe Jones – Drums

CD 5 Plays The Best Of Lerner & Loewe

1. I’ve Grown Accustomed To Her Face (4:17)

2. I Could Have Danced All Night (3:44)

3. The Heather On The Hill (5:07)

4. On The Street Where You Live (8:39)

5. Almost Like Being In Love (4:55)

6. Thank Heaven For Little Girls (4:37)

7. I Talk To The Trees (5:53)

8. Show Me (6:34)

Total Playing Time: Approx 43 mins

Original Album Produced By Orrin Keepnews

Recorded July 21st-22nd, 1959, At Reeves Sound Studios, NY

Originally Released On Riverside Records (RLP 12-307), 1959

Personnel:
